MacroOp.Name: OMNI_OS_WIN8
MacroOp.Brief: Defines that Windows 8 API headers should be used.
MacroOp.Considerations: OS detection via preprocessor flags is not always guaranteed as they can be explicitly defined by a user. Take care when relying on these macros to determine platform specifics.
MacroOp.Synopsis: If compilation happens on a platform (or with a compiler) with _WIN32_WINNT >= 0x0602, this macro is enabled (defined). See @h omni/defs/global.hpp @h for which flags enable this option.
